results.name: Array of even catheti of primitive Pythagorean triangles when read by SW-NE diagonals.
comment: See the comments, reference and links in A208853. The present array is b(n,m) = 2*(2*n-1)*(2*m)  if gcd((2*n-1,2*m)=1 and 0 otherwise.  u=2*n-1, v=2*m. The array read by SW-NE diagonals is T(n,m):=b(n-m+1,m), n>=m>=1.
All primitive Pythagorean triples are given by
(a(n,m)=A208854(n,m),b(n,m),c(n,m)= A208853(n,m)), n>=1, m>=1. If the entry is 0 there is no primitive Pythagorean triple for these n and m values.
formula: T(n,m)=b(n-m+1,m), n>=m>=1, with b(n,m):= 4*(2*n-1)*m if gcd((2*n-1,2*m)=1 and 0 otherwise.
example: For some triples see the example section of A208853.
